name: Emerald Orb

refinement_effect.refine_one: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 20% for 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 25% for 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 30% for 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 35% for 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 40% for 12s.

description: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyunjian north of Liyue. It is small, light, and durable.
